SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Shannon Finley’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that we continue to put forth action in making sure every tomorrow is better than yesterday…”

– Ms. Shannon Finley, High School Spanish Educator @FCASD https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/put-forth-action-making-every-tomorrow-better-yesterday/
